background_description: The image displays a turbulent ocean scene in black and white. Large, powerful waves are crashing and breaking, creating significant amounts of white foam and spray, especially in the foreground and mid-ground. The water appears dark and textured with ripples and swells further out. The sky above is overcast, blending into the distant, rough sea. A narrow strip of dark, seemingly wet sand or beach is visible at the very bottom of the frame.
explanation: No organism is visible in this image. The scene exclusively depicts an environmental landscape consisting of a stormy ocean with large waves and a dark beach. Therefore, there is no subject to exhibit camouflage.
